titles: Two letters of His Majesties left upon the table at Hampton-Court the 11 of November, 1647 the one to Colonell Whaley, the other to Lord Mountague : also a letter of advice to His Majestie, subscribed by E.R.
author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
E. R.
notes: Requesting that possessions of the King be given to certain individuals.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
